page.title: 14FAMILY LIFE IN SUTTON
page.content: A Weekend in the Life of a Sutton Family. My dad and my grandad are nurserymen.On Saturdays my dad goes to market in Hitchin.My mum stays at home with my sister.I go to market in Stevenage with my grandad and help him to sell plants.I go home with my grandad at 3pm and my dad comes home at 6pm.When I get home from market I go to see my mum and my sister.On Saturday nights I sleep at my nan's.On Sunday morning I get up at 7am and play with my toys.I have tea and biscuits and go outside to see my mum and my sister going off to Bedford to play Squash.When they come back I go home to watch television and then go to bed.
